com.eatthepath.jvptree

Class SamplingMedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eatthepath.jvptree.MedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
      • com.eatthepath.jvptree.SamplingMedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>

    public class SamplingMedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
extends MedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
implements ThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
    A threshold distance selection strategy that uses the median distance from the origin to a subset of the given list of points as the threshold.
    Author:
    Jon Chambers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_SAMPLES 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SamplingMedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy(int numberOfSamples)
      Constructs a threshold selector that uses up to the given number of samples from a list of points to choose a median distance.

      <R extends T> 
      double      		 selectThreshold(List<R> points, R origin, DistanceFunction<? super R> distanceFunction)
      Returns the median distance of a subset of the given points from the given origin.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SamplingMedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy

        public SamplingMedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy(int numberOfSamples)
        Constructs a threshold selector that uses up to the given number of samples from a list of points to choose a median distance.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSamples - the maximum number of samples to use when choosing a median distance

    • Method Detail

      • selectThreshold

        public <R extends T> double selectThreshold(List<R> points,
                                   R origin,
                                   DistanceFunction<? super R> distanceFunction)
        Returns the median distance of a subset of the given points from the given origin. The given list of points may be partially sorted in the process.
        Specified by:
        selectThreshold in interface ThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
        Overrides:
        selectThreshold in class MedianDistanceThresholdSelectionStrategy<T>
        Parameters:
        points - the list of points from which a median distance will be chosen
        origin - the point from which distances to other points will be calculated
        distanceFunction - the function to be used to calculate the distance between the origin and other points
        Returns:
        the median distance from the origin to the given list of points
